tags: I dont want to be attacked with toxicity so...
summary: Since YouTube always suggests Jon and Dany's first meeting for me to watch, I went and watched it again. And yet again, I ticked...
body:
Since YouTube always suggests Jon and Dany’s first meeting for me to watch, I went and watched it again. And yet again, I ticked myself off by listening to her inaccuracies. Disclaimer: I never disliked Daenerys, that is until the toxic fandom decided the she’s the only woman of the show worth anything and is the end all be all of the show. Anyways, back to the point, she says that the last king in the North was Torrhen Stark. Girl, you really dont know the kingdom you’re about to rule. The last KitN was homeboi Sexy McGinger right here

Storming a hostile environment guns blazing is never a good strategy. You have to know the area before you do anything. You come in, with your dragons and dothrakis, spouting bull and expect to be sworn fealty to? HELL NAH! Oh, and then you’re “reminding” the current KitN that you’ve got dragons and dothrakis who’ll kill for you. Real subtle. Intimidation is one thing to make someone subdue to you but threatening is just wrong. You want someone to willingly bend to you? Intimidate. You want to enslave? Threaten. No wonder Jon was hostile, and dont comment that he was getting his rocks off on her dominance because he really wasn’t. His reaction was frustration, snappish, and defiance.

Finally, you get to the part where she says “I’m the right queen of the seven kingdoms…” yada yada yada. No, you’re not. The throne was won by conquest so baratheons were the true rulers. Then the lannisters took over by coupe and now they were the rightful rulers. So, yeah I agree the North is in open rebellion; in open rebellion to Queen Cersei, who is in all fairness Queen of the SK.

It ticks me off that neither of her advisors thought of actually educating her on the land she was about to rule. She has good intentions, but the lack of education and guidance is resulting in her ending up like viserys. Someone help the poor girl. Not you, olenna. Olenna, you’re throwing a lit match at the powder keg. That’s another thing I want to scream about. Things would’ve been favorable for Dany if she had come in on a dragon with her dothraki and parlayed with the Lannister army. She could’ve said “let’s talk before we fight. Y'all know I’m a better choice. Surrender now and things will go smoothly. Otherwise, we start fighting and all of you die.” Hell even Ramsay met with Jon and talked before BotB.

title: Firsts
body:
Written for @jonsadrabbles​ Round 2 - Day 1: Firsts - Relief

When she had been in high school she had actually been looking forward to this, to university, to making new friends, to maybe getting an invitation for a sorority or other secret club. But at the moment she had to admit that she was a little overwhelmed. She had a lot of first the last few days.

 College AU

“Your turn, Sansa!” Margaery smiled when she pointed at the bottle in the middle of the circle of soon to be friends. “There is nothing to be afraid of, because there are only handsome and amazing people here.”

Sansa forced herself to smile back at the senior student. When she had been in high school she had actually been looking forward to this, to university, to making new friends, to maybe getting an invitation for a sorority or other secret club. But at the moment she had to admit that she was a little overwhelmed. She had a lot of first the last few days.

The first time to be kidnapped in the middle of the night, which turned out to be that invitation she had been dreaming of.

The first time to get lost and arrive too late for one of the classes she had been looking forward to.

The first time to fall asleep on her book without having dinner, because the required reading was much more than she could handle.

And the first time to play spin the bottle with a group of absolute and total strangers who acted like something like a kiss was not that big of a deal. Maybe they were right, but for Sansa this was her first kiss and she was quite certain that to her this still was a big deal, even though it was only a game.

After taking a deep breath Sansa grabbed the bottle and spun it. She only realized she had maybe used a little too much force when the bottle just kept on spinning and spinning, that long that even the others seemed to lose their interest.

But eventually the bottle stopped and pointed at a handsome young man with dark eyes, long black curls and a frown on his forehead.

“Jon! What a perfect match!” Margaery clapped her hands and Sansa licked her lips, a little unsure what to do next. “Go on! Go to him and kiss him!”

Sansa took another deep breath and on her hands and her knees she crawled towards Jon, holding still a few inches from him.

Jon reluctantly placed his hands in her sides and Sansa avoided looking at him, avoided his glance. “Is this your first kiss?” He spoke softly, that softly that probably no one else could hear him.

Sansa looked up and her eyes widened before she nodded. Her cheeks started glowing, probably being redder than red and she nervously tucked a strand of red hair behind her ear.

“I know it’s the wrong order, but what about a date after this? Tomorrow evening? Just the two of us?”

Sansa was not sure if he was just saying that to make her feel more at ease, but her lips curled up into a smile. “We’ll see about that after the kiss.”

Jon didn’t get the chance to smile back.

Sansa wrapped her arms around Jon’s neck and firmly she pressed her lips on his.

summary: There’s now just six days left to join the Tinfoil Throne Secret Santa. Registration for our exchange will close on November 24....
body:
There’s now just six days left to join the Tinfoil Throne Secret Santa. Registration for our exchange will close on November 24. So, if you’ve been looking for a ASoIaF/GOT Secret Santa to join, it’s not too late!

While this event prioritises rare and crack pairings, we’re open to shippy and gen content of all kinds, so long as it fits our theme of crack and AUs. We are also open to the fandoms of both the books and the show.

Join our exchange now and ensure no ASoIaF/GOT fan’s stocking goes empty! Things will be more fun and exciting if we have a nice range of participants.

You can find our rules here and the registration form here.

blog.title: pro jonerys who likes healthy debates

title: “Good boots are hard to find”
body:
November 20 – day 3 (foreshadowing and parallels)

The day before she goes blind, Arya slices the throat of a Night’s Watch deserter in Braavos, throw his body in the water and keep his boots.

That’s both echoing what happened to her mother at the Twins (her throat was sliced and her body dumped in the river) and what Jon does to Janos Slynt in ADWD: Slynt lose his head for refusing an order and Jon allows Owen the Oaf to help himself to Slynt’s boots. Arya kills Dareon for disobeying her brother’s orders, but we’re also told that Cat of the Canals used to walk around the Ragman’s Harbor “in a pair of battered boots too big for her feet” (Cat of the Canals – AFFC).

In her first ADWD chapter, Daenerys is offered a pair of slippers that are too small for her:

“Cleon the Great sends these slippers as a token of his love for Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons.”

Irri slid the slippers onto Dany’s feet. They were gilded leather, decorated with green freshwater pearls. Does the butcher king believe a pair of pretty slippers will win my hand? “King Cleon is most generous. You may thank him for his lovely gift.” Lovely, but made for a child. Dany had small feet, yet the pointed slippers mashed her toes together. – Dany, ADWD

So… parallels? We’ll dig a bit further:

At the end of the day she would often sit on a rock and dangle her feet in the cool water. She had finally thrown away her cracked and rotted shoes. Walking barefoot was hard at first, but the blisters had finally broken, the cuts had healed, and her soles had turned to leather. The mud was nice between her toes, and she liked to feel the earth underfoot when she walked. – Arya, ACOK

 

The rocks had scraped her hands raw. They are better than they were, though, she decided as she picked at a broken blister. Her skin was pink and tender, and a pale milky fluid was leaking from her cracked palms, but her burns were healing.

The sun was hot this morning, the sky blue and cloudless. That was good. Dany’s clothes were hardly more than rags, and offered little in the way of warmth. One of her sandals had slipped off during her wild flight from Meereen and she had left the other up by Drogon’s cave, preferring to go barefoot rather than half-shod. – Daenerys, ADWD

Both girls are lost in nature, with broken blisters and healing injuries (cuts and burns) and both decide to go barefoot, Arya because her shoes were “cracked and rotted”, Dany for having lost one. However, whereas Arya’s soles “had turned to leather”, Dany’s feet blisters again:

She was very tired, and fresh blisters had appeared on both her feet, including a matched set upon her pinky toes. – Daenerys, ADWD

I tend to think that Arya’s feet were “hardened” by the fact that she was walking North, while Dany’s feet bled from her attempt at returning to Meereen.

The new skin beneath the blisters is a symbol of rebirth: Arya and Dany have “thrown away” and “scraped” their old skins, either because it was too old and “rotted” (in Arya’s case), or because it didn’t fit right (in Dany’s case). Arya’s feet successfully take roots, while Dany’s new path rejects her. Their bare feet might also have something to do with a reconnection with their spirit animals (and Dany loose one of her sandals in mid-air, which is also symbolic).

Cat’s boots are too big (probably pointing to how “lost” Arya feels in AFFC) and Dany’s slippers are too small (probably pointing to how “trapped” Dany feels in ADWD). Cat remains Cat through most of the chapter, until she kills Dareon and admit to the kindly man that it was “Arya of House Stark” who did it – perhaps because the act reconnects her with her mother and her brother Jon, and gets her a pair of boots that fit right.

Jon is another matter altogether: after killing Slynt, he gives the boots to someone else.

Janos Slynt twisted his neck around to stare up at him. “Please, my lord. Mercy. I’ll … I’ll go, I will, I …”

No, thought Jon. You closed that door. Longclaw descended. “Can I have his boots?” asked Owen the Oaf, as Janos Slynt’s head went rolling across the muddy ground. “They’re almost new, those boots. Lined with fur.”

Jon glanced back at Stannis. For an instant their eyes met. Then the king nodded and went back inside his tower. – Jon, ADWD

Side note: the “Tales of Peter Rabbit” by Beatrix Potter was translated in French under the title “le conte de Jeannot Lapin”. Isn’t it funny that Jon took Janos’s head, and Dany her “rabbit ears”, in the same book? But I digress. We know that Janos lost to Jon in the LC elections, and we know that Janos’s plans for the Night’s Watch, should he have been elected, were nowhere near Jon’s. Jon, obviously, has no interesting in wearing Janos’s boots. Owen the Oaf takes the boots and Jon takes the head.

The irony is that, had Jon worn Janos’s “boots”, he probably wouldn’t have been killed. But then, he wouldn’t be Jon. The boots likely wouldn’t fit him.

In any case, in asoiaf, the shoes you wear and don’t wear might reveal some things about who you are – and who you’re not.

iss your ~problematic~ fave |  JON SNOW | CLERITH | CLOUD STRIFE |

MATT MURDOCK | SPACE |  karedevil | kastle | mattelektra | ben poindexter | RICK GRIMES | richonne | CARYL | ichiruki | sasusaku | GAME OF THRONES | aliens | synthwave | the walking dead (1-6) ♥

tags: see you in april-may when jon and dany are sitting on the throne saving the world
summary: jon is not going to sacrifice ANYONE he loves to end the war. if you think his character would ever do that to his PREGNANT...
body:
jon is not going to sacrifice ANYONE he loves to end the war. if you think his character would ever do that to his PREGNANT wife, yall have not been paying attention to jon snow. 

every time i hear a jonsa say jon is gonna betray dany or kill her… im just thinking ARE WE TALKING ABOUT THE SAME MAN?

the same man that did THIS 

when he KNEW it was a lost cause?

no. jon ain’t killing ANYONE he loves.

jon is azor ahai in the sense that he’s going to save the world from the others. that is true. but as GRRM has repeatedly said, don’t take the folklore so seriously in the story. just like in real life, details get harder and harder to discern as truth the older it gets. 

jon killing dany “nissa nissa” style goes against every fiber of jon’s being. and while im far more of a jon fan than a dany fan, so im more obsessed with details surrounding him, i cant exactly predict how dany’s story will end (i hope it’s ruling with jon) but i know for a fact that this story is not ending with jon killing his god damn wife who literally sacrificed her children for him and has done nothing but bring good to the world.


thanks for coming to my ted talk

body:
Jonsa Drabbles - day 1

Firsts | Relief

Jon never had a sister before.

There was only Robb, his brother, and Father in his family. Lady Catelyn kept herself away enough that he never really thought of her much, except she was his father’s wife, and Robb’s mother. Sometimes, Jon had to remind himself of her existence.

He meets the baby in the quiet of night, hand in hand with Father. Robb is sleeping with his mother, so they are alone in the nursery. It’s the first time that Jon sees a baby so close, or that someone allows him to hold them.

She has soft skin and red, spindly limbs. Her head is covered in thin, auburn hairs, but her eyes are still closed.

“Be careful,” says Father, “Sansa is very fragile… hold her head.”

“I’m careful,” he answers, holding her close to him.

He remembers how the bells rung in Wintertown all day, celebrating her birth. How Father smiled in a way he’s never seen before. Lady Catelyn is resting, but he imagines that she was happy as well.

It’s the effect Sansa has on them.

“You have to protect her, you see,” Father starts,” You and Robb. She is your little sister, Jon. This world does not like little sisters, so you must be her protector.”

“Like a knight in a shining armor?” he asks.

Father chuckles and ruffles his dark hair. “Yes, like a knight.”

Jon smiles, pleased. He looks at Sansa again, how she moves with her mind far off in a dream. He kisses her forehead and promises himself that he will be good, he will protect her.

Jon Snow always keeps his promises.

Every battle-Three Monarch 
Every betrayal _Ned Stark’s death (We all know who is traitor there )
Every risk_Dany in House...
body:
Season 8 teaser has step. Follow this post and look at!

Every battle-Three Monarch 

Every betrayal _Ned Stark’s death (We all know who is traitor there )

Every risk_Dany in House Undying 

Every fight_Jaime in Hihgarden 

Every sacrifice_Tyrion,Ned Stark ,Hodor,Mircella

Every death _Tyrel and Martel 

Ned Stark’s death is everywhere. Showrunners don’t want to forget Ned Stark’s death. This scene is everywhere. and especially with Arya! 

Look at Braavos. Arya was looking Joffryes death in street. Who are looking her? Of Course Sansa! 

She is looking at Sansa 

Arya to Sansa in Winterfel. 

Arya to Sansa: I would have let them to kill me before I betrayed my family …I remember you standing on that platform with Joffry and Cersei when thet dragged father to the block. I remember pretty dress you were wearing ….(Arya always  mentioned her father Ned Stark again.and especially his death. she never forget her father’s death and Sansa with beautiful dress.   )

Bran mentioned to Sansa how she merried with Stark’s enemy. Man whose father killed their family 

Bran to Sansa:

‘‘So beautiful that night. snow for just like that and you where so beautiful. and your white wedding dress’‘

How Bran tried not look at Sansa 



The north remember. North never forget traitors
